thread.section_title: DoYouSpain.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre DoYouSpain.com | doyouspain.com | 6 de 515
thread.title: Michael Bradley

author: Michael Bradley
title: Michael Bradley
text:
Previously booked with DYS and had good service. Refunded a diesel supplement which had been secretly charged by Gold Car.
Just hoping the car hire is as easy without the hard sell tactics and the identification of small scratches which seem to appear when you return the car. Because we have our own excess insurance some companies think it is fair game to charge for damage which we missed when taking photos on arrival simply because we can reclaim the cost back home.
